title: tudi sheidiDu manamE
sahitya:
tudi sheidiDu manamE nI dinamtOrum muruganai


anupallavi

  padam avanuDaiyadE shatamenavE karudi pazhaniyampati tigazh azhagan pugazh pADi


caraNam    bhaktiyODu tan padam paTrip-paNindiDum attanai anbaraiyum aNaindu annai pOla 
cittam kanindu veghu shIghram parivODu salippillAdu aruLai aLittuk-kaLippOnai
